column5: My place is close to : (driving without traffic) Dallas Cowboys AT&T Stadium (10 mins),  Ballpark Rangers (10 mins),  Six Flags Over Texas (12 mins), UTA (12 mins) , TCU (20 mins,  Ft Worth Stockyard (24 mins),  Ft Worth Zoo (20 mins),  Ft Worth Modern Art Museum (17 mins),  Ft Worth Convention Center (15 mins)  Youâ€™ll love my place because of the comfy beds and the coziness.
